channel.title: Docker on Go Ahead
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Go Ahead

item.title: Auto-deployment of your app from Github
item.description: Introduction Yesterday (!) I asked in the Gophers slack for recommendations for deployment of static Go binaries, as I was in the process of deploying a demo for another blog post I’m working on. I was told to check out Scaleway among other things, and found it to be an excellent option for simple and cheap hosting. It currently provides data centres in Paris and Amsterdam, which is perfect for me.
